mapper.select: SELECT A.CL_LotNo, A.CL_ItemCode, B.Product_Item_Name CL_ItemName, A.CL_CrateCode, A.CL_Qty, A.CL_Create_Date FROM Crate_Lot_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.CL_ItemCode = B.Product_Item_Code where A.CL_MachineCode = #{machineCode}
SELECT CL_LotNo, CL_ItemCode, CL_CrateCode, CL_Qty, CL_Create_Date FROM Crate_Lot_tbl where CL_MachineCode = #{machineCode} and CL_Use_Status = 0 order by CL_Create_Date desc limit 3

SELECT A.CL_LotNo, A.CL_ItemCode, B.Product_Item_Name CL_ItemName, A.CL_CrateCode, A.CL_MachineCode, A.CL_MachineCode2, A.CL_ProductionQty, A.CL_Qty, A.CL_Create_Date FROM Crate_Lot_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.CL_ItemCode = B.Product_Item_Code inner join Crate_tbl C on A.CL_LotNo = C.C_Production_LotNo where A.CL_MachineCode2 = #{machineCode} and C.C_Condition = '3' order by A.CL_Create_Date asc

SELECT clt.CL_LotNo, clt.CL_ItemCode, clt.CL_Qty, clt.CL_Create_Date, pit.Product_Item_Name CL_ItemName, pit.Product_Info_STND_1 CL_STND_1, dt.Child_TBL_Type CL_Item_Material, dt2.Child_TBL_Type CL_Item_Clsfc_Name_1, dt3.Child_TBL_Type CL_Item_Clsfc_Name_2 FROM Crate_Lot_tbl clt INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON clt.CL_ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt ON pit.Product_Material = dt.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt2 ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt2.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt3 ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_2 = dt3.Child_TBL_No
WHERE clt.CL_Create_Date >= #{startDate} and clt.CL_Create_Date < #{endDate}
AND clt.CL_LotNo LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{LotNo},'%')
AND clt.CL_ItemCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ItemCode},'%')

SELECT distinct clt.*, eit.Equipment_Info_Name as CL_EquipName, pit.Product_Item_Name as CL_ItemName, pit.Product_Info_STND_1 as CL_STND_1, dt.Child_TBL_Type as CL_Item_Clsfc_Name_1, proit.Process_Inspect_Qty as CL_Process_Inspect_Qty FROM Crate_Lot_tbl clt INNER JOIN Equipment_Info_tbl eit ON clt.CL_MachineCode = eit.Equipment_Info_Code INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON clt.CL_ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt.Child_TBL_No LEFT OUTER JOIN Process_Inspect_tbl proit ON clt.CL_LotNo = proit.Process_Inspect_LotNo WHERE clt.CL_ProductionQty = clt.CL_Qty
AND clt.CL_Create_Date >= #{startDate} AND clt.CL_Create_Date < #{endDate}
AND clt.CL_ItemCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{itemCode},'%') AND clt.CL_MachineCode LIKE CONCAT('%',#{machineCode},'%')
AND clt.CL_LotNo LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{LotNo},'%')
AND proit.Process_Inspect_Qty is null ORDER BY clt.CL_Create_Date

SELECT clt.CL_LotNo, clt.CL_ItemCode, pit.Product_Item_Name CL_ItemName, clt.CL_Qty, clt.CL_Create_Date FROM Crate_Lot_tbl clt INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit on clt.CL_ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code
WHERE CL_LotNo = #{LotNo}
mapper.insert: insert ignore into Crate_Lot_tbl( CL_LotNo, CL_ItemCode, CL_CrateCode, CL_MachineCode, CL_Qty, CL_Create_Date )values( #{CL_LotNo}, #{CL_ItemCode}, #{CL_CrateCode}, #{CL_MachineCode}, 0, now() )
mapper.update: update Crate_Lot_tbl set CL_MachineCode2 = #{CL_MachineCode2}, CL_Create_Date = now() where CL_LotNo = #{CL_LotNo}
